# Table Creation

```{r}
#| label: create a DT interactive table

# This table only works in browsers as of now (2024-05-08)

datatable(my_list, extensions = 'Buttons', options = list(
  dom = 'Bfrtip', 
  escape = FALSE,
  buttons = c('copy', 'csv', 'excel', 'pdf', 'print'))) |>
  saveWidget("table.html")
```
